sql: SELECT c.CategoryName, SUM(od.Quantity) as TotalQty FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-06-01' AND '1997-06-30' GROUP BY c.CategoryName ORDER BY TotalQty DESC LIMIT 1
explanation: SQL query executed. Referenced 1 document chunks.

sql: SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) as AOV FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-12-01' AND '1997-12-31'
explanation: SQL query executed. Referenced 1 document chunks.

sql: SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) as Revenue FROM "Order Details" od JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) as Revenue FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE c.CategoryName = 'Beverages' AND o.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-06-01' AND '1997-06-30'
explanation: SQL query executed. Referenced 1 document chunks.

sql: SELECT c.CompanyName, SUM(0.3 * od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) as Margin FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE strftime('%Y', o.OrderDate) = '1997' GROUP BY c.CompanyName ORDER BY Margin DESC LIMIT 1
explanation: SQL query executed. Referenced 1 document chunks.
